=== Software Freedom Day 2009 ===
* Date: '''25th & 26th September 2009'''
* Venue: Swinburne University of Technology (Sarawak Campus), Kuching, Malaysia
* Activities:
** Installfest
** Booths for Q&A and other sponsors
** Presentation on Joomla
** Talk on "OSS in Healthcare"
** IT Career Talk
** Talk on "FOSS Alternatives to Proprietary Graphics Software"
